name: TV Lawyers Trivia Game | Things in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: This 1970's teen sweetheart went on to portray Grace Van Owen, an assistant district attorney who later joined the firm McKenzie-Brackman on 'LA Law'.
Which of the following characters is NOT a lawyer in the firm portrayed on 'The Practice'?
questions.explanation:
Tommy Mullaney.

	He was a lawyer on 'LA Law', played by John Spencer. Spencer played Chief of Staff Leo McGarry on 'The West Wing'.

questions.text: This TV lawyer was first played in 1930's movies (6 times), then in a 1957-66 TV series (portrayed by Raymond Burr), and finally in over 2 dozen made-for-TV movies (also by Burr).
This actor portrayed ADA Dan Fielding on 'Night Court'.
What was the name of Capt. Kirk's defense attorney in the 'Star Trek' episode 'Court Martial'?
questions.explanation:
Samuel T. Cogley

	Shaw was the prosecuting attorney, Finney was the alleged victim of Kirk's crime, and Louvois was the JAG Officer in the TNG episode 'The Measure of a Man'.

questions.text: Who portrayed Douglas Wambaugh on the series 'Picket Fences'?
questions.explanation:
Fyvush Finkel.

	Walston and Skeritt played the judge and sheriff respectively on 'Picket Fences'. Rachins played Douglas Brackman on 'LA Law'.

questions.text: This lawyer marries his wife on their first date. Even though their love grows, things are complicated by his parents (staunch Republicans) and her parents (freewheeling hippies).
questions.explanation:
Greg Montgomery.

	Title character on 'Dharma and Greg'. Interesting note: Dharma's hippie father is played by Alan Rachins, who played Douglas Brackman on 'LA Law'.

questions.text: Which of the following TV characters is a lawyer?
questions.explanation:
Cara Jean Lamb.

	Cara Jean 'C.J.' was a lawyer on 'LA Law', played by Amanda Donohoe. O'Hara (Bill Bixby) was a newspaper reporter, McCoy (DeForest Kelley) was a doctor, and Lucy Hatcher (Marla Sokoloff) is the receptionist on 'The Practice'.

questions.text: Which of the following TV characters is NOT a lawyer?
questions.explanation:
Adam Stephens.

	Adam was the Darrin and Samantha's son on 'Bewitched'. Bay is an ADA on 'The Practice', Burger was the DA on 'Perry Mason', and Claire Kincaid was an ADA on 'Law and Order'.

questions.text: Which of the following married lawyer couples were played by actors married to each other?
questions.explanation:
Ann Kelsey and Stuart Markowitz.

	Played by Jill Eikenberry and Michael Tucker, they've been married since 1973. BTW, Ross and Robinette ('Law and Order') were never on their show together, much less married.
